name: PUNCH FIT
description:
Punch Fit is the answer to your exercise needs. Follow the example and punch and dodge for an easy and fun workout. Learn various combinations of punches, dodges, and rushes to make your play more exhilarating and pleasant.

OVER 50 WORKOUTS

Enjoy a workout that suits your needs in terms of time and difficulty. We plan to add more and more new workouts in the future.

EXERCISE REWARDS

Exercise and earn drop points to get skin packs. You can get over 100 skins.

EXCITING BACKGROUND MUSIC

We have prepared a variety of background music to match your workout. Let's get into the groove and have fun.

UPCOMING UPDATES

Add new actions
Add new workouts
Add new skins
New environments
Manage play records
and more...
